post:
TinyKVM, a division of RAM Host, for nearly 4 years has been providing quality budget web hosting services.

We are pleased to announce that we have our popular TinyKVM plans stocked and available now!

For only $35 per year (about £21), you get all this:

128 MB Dedicated RAM
3 GB Disk Space (Fast Enterprise SAS 10K RPM RAID10 storage)
500 GB Transfer
Gigabit (1000mbps) Network Port
Out of band console access
VPS management control panel
Native IPv6
OS support: Arch Linux, Debian, FreeBSD, Gentoo, Ubuntu, and others.
Run your own kernel - bring your own ISO cd/dvd image.
Multi-homed quality bandwidth (nLayer/Cogent transit plus over 50 peers connected on the LINX and LoNAP network exchanges).
Ping/traceroutes to 146.185.21.1

Visit http://tinykvm.com/ to place your order.
